member.name: PRJ_STARTVIRTUALIZING_OPTIONS
member.summary: Options to provide when starting a virtualization instance.

member.name: PRJ_STARTVIRTUALIZING_OPTIONS.PoolThreadCount
member.summary: The number of threads the provider wants to create to service callbacks.

member.name: PRJ_STARTVIRTUALIZING_OPTIONS.ConcurrentThreadCount
member.summary: The maximum number of threads the provider wants to run concurrently to process callbacks.

member.name: PRJ_STARTVIRTUALIZING_OPTIONS.NotificationMappings
member.summary: An array of zero or more notification mappings. See the Remarks section of PRJ_NOTIFICATION MAPPING for more details.

member.name: PRJ_STARTVIRTUALIZING_OPTIONS.NotificationMappingsCount
member.summary: The number of notification mappings provided in NotificationMappings.
